ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
You look like you’ve got a lot of energy today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s get out
there together and do our best.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. It’s good to see
your face again today.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Oh, by the way, this is for you.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I don’t know if you’ll find it useful or not,
but please take it anyway.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
This is for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Please accept it.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Thanks for everything you’ve done so far. I hope
we’ll continue to be friends.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
This is a present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I do hope you’ll
accept it.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2103_02_10: I thought you might like it, so I got it for you.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2103_03_10: I hope you’re pleased with it.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Sure, let’s talk for a bit.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Yes, definitely. Let’s have a chat. All your stories
are so fascinating, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
You’re giving this to me? Thanks. I’ll take good 
care of it.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I feel like you truly understand me, and that makes
me really happy. Thank you!
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2402_01_10: See you later, then. It was nice talking to you.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
I get so wrapped up talking with you that I lose
track of time, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0089_00_n_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Let’s make some time to talk again soon. I’ll be
looking forward to it.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
There are formulas I’ve been using lately...
Ones for spending time together with friends.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I’ve been thinking up ways to help my partner
Pokémon relax more.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I wonder what his... What Ghetsis’s
past was like.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I don’t know anything about his parents or
his childhood...
ch0089_00_n_salon/8002_0701_03_10: I wonder if I ever will.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I always appreciate ferris wheels, whether I’m
riding or watching them.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8003_0701_02_10: I find myself entranced by their beautiful design.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
But I’ve heard many others are more charmed
by the gorgeous shapes they make against the
night sky.
ch0089_00_n_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
To create the greatest formula and the greatest
ferris wheel ever, for both humans and Pokémon
to enjoy... Perhaps that’s my dream, too.
